divs: Sighting DetailsI was driving home late Saturday night around 10pm and while I was driving I noticed 3 bright orange lights moving together in a triangle like shape I also noticed another orange light moving behind the others. I have never seen anything like that before. It kind of scared me to witness this. I lost sight of the objects while driving.
Object Flight Path: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
